summary: An FBI internal email chain from July 1, 2020, providing a list of Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings with their personal details, including dates of birth, addresses, and international flight travel history. The document appears to be part of investigative background work on Maxwell's family connections.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is a list of her siblings compiled by the FBI as part of an investigation.

persons.name: Christine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with an address noted.

persons.name: Isabel Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with an address noted.

persons.name: Karine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling, noted as deceased with a date of birth.

persons.name: Ann (Anne) Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling, also known as Anne Holve, married to Lawrence Holve, with no US residence and an outbound flight to the UK in 2015.

persons.name: Lawrence Holve
persons.context: Mentioned as the husband of Ann (Anne) Maxwell (Anne Holve).

persons.name: Kevin Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with no US residence and an inbound flight to Boston from London in February 2020.

persons.name: Michael Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling, noted as deceased with a date of birth.

persons.name: Ian Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with no US residence and an outbound flight to London from Boston in December 2017.

persons.name: Philip Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with no travel history and no identified US residence.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively compiling detailed background information on Ghislaine Maxwell's family, specifically her eight siblings, in July 2020.
Several of Maxwell's siblings (Ann, Kevin, Ian) had recent international travel between the US and UK, with specific flight dates recorded by investigators.
Two siblings, Karine Maxwell and Michael Maxwell, are noted as deceased in the document.
The document shows the FBI was tracking the residential status and movement of Maxwell's family members, noting which had 'no identified residence in the US'.
